subject: Buy Lottery Tickets
body:
Worldwide Lotto 
      service

The official, global lottery agent allows you to purchase 
      lottery ticketsfrom over 50 of the leading lotteries from around the 
      world.With total jackpots passing $500 
      Million,this is your chance to win huge prizes!Your chance to win 
      over $81'000'000 !!!Its happening this Friday - over $81 
      Million to be drawn in the biggest lottery of the week in North 
      America. Buy as many tickets as you want and increase your chance to 
      change your life forever.Over 300'000 ticket holders will win 
      prizes in this week of exciting draws.Or Search the World for 48 
      lotteries with total jackpots of US$ 427'368'620

Get your tickets now to all 
      the leading lotteries from around the 
world!
